profile:
Why Choose Mill Creek Painters?

At Mill Creek Painters, we are proud to say that we are one of the best Residential and Commercial Painting Contractors in Edmonton and in Calgary. With over 25 years experience, we promise our clients to provide the highest quality painting and contracting services at highly competitive rates. We guarantee by the end of the project you will have an environment as unique as you!

To make this possible we offer to all clients:
Outstanding Customer Service: Our staff are available to answer any and all of your questions. Your inquiries will be responded quickly, and regardless of your schedule!

Free In-Home Colour Consultations: House & Condo Painters specially provide free colour consultation before starting the job. We will give you our professional opinion on the colour and finish combinations that will make your home as you dream!

We Only Use High-Quality Paint: We only use well-known and trusted products to deliver the best results for your home. Often working with brands such as Benjamin Moore, Sherwin Williams, Cloverdale, we will never use paint below the "Super" grade. This will ensure you have a high-quality paint job that is washable and durable for years to come. All left-over paint is left with you for future projects.

Experienced Professionals: At Mill Creek Painters we only hire professional, skilled painters for all of our projects. This helps us to ensure that the work we provide is of the highest quality and completed within the shortest amount of time.
